law.catch_line: Civil remedies for injunction and damages.
law.text: Any person injured by any act in violation of the provisions of this chapter shall have a civil cause of action in Circuit Court to enjoin further violations, and to recover the actual damages sustained, together with the costs of the law suit. The court's order or judgment shall include a reasonable fee for the plaintiff's attorney of record and any other remedies contained in this chapter.
law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 323, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 104, sec. 8.
